org.apache.flink.runtime.operators.sort

类 UnilateralSortMerger.SpillingThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.operators.sort.UnilateralSortMerger.ThreadBase<E>
        • org.apache.flink.runtime.operators.sort.UnilateralSortMerger.SpillingThread
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Runnable, Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
    直接已知子类:
    CombiningUnilateralSortMerger.CombiningSpillingThread
    封闭类:
    UnilateralSortMerger<E>

    protected class UnilateralSortMerger.SpillingThread
extends UnilateralSortMerger.ThreadBase<E>
    The thread that handles the spilling of intermediate results and sets up the merging. It also merges the channels until sufficiently few channels remain to perform the final streamed merge.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 java.lang.Thread

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SpillingThread

        public SpillingThread(ExceptionHandler<IOException> exceptionHandler,
                      UnilateralSortMerger.CircularQueues<E> queues,
                      AbstractInvokable parentTask,
                      MemoryManager memManager,
                      IOManager ioManager,
                      org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<E> serializer,
                      org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeComparator<E> comparator,
                      List<org.apache.flink.core.memory.MemorySegment> sortReadMemory,
                      List<org.apache.flink.core.memory.MemorySegment> writeMemory,
                      int maxNumFileHandles)
        Creates the spilling thread.
        参数:
        exceptionHandler - The exception handler to call for all exceptions.
        queues - The queues used to pass buffers between the threads.
        parentTask - The task that started this thread. If non-null, it is used to register this thread.
        memManager - The memory manager used to allocate buffers for the readers and writers.
        ioManager - The I/I manager used to instantiate readers and writers from.
        serializer -
        comparator -
        sortReadMemory -
        writeMemory -
        maxNumFileHandles -

      • getMergingIterator

        protected final MergeIterator<E> getMergingIterator(List<UnilateralSortMerger.ChannelWithBlockCount> channelIDs,
                                                    List<List<org.apache.flink.core.memory.MemorySegment>> inputSegments,
                                                    List<FileIOChannel> readerList,
                                                    org.apache.flink.util.MutableObjectIterator<E> largeRecords)
                                             throws IOException
        Returns an iterator that iterates over the merged result from all given channels.
        参数:
        channelIDs - The channels that are to be merged and returned.
        inputSegments - The buffers to be used for reading. The list contains for each channel one list of input segments. The size of the inputSegments list must be equal to that of the channelIDs list.
        返回:
        An iterator over the merged records of the input channels.
        抛出:
        IOException - Thrown, if the readers encounter an I/O problem.

      • mergeChannelList

        protected final List<UnilateralSortMerger.ChannelWithBlockCount> mergeChannelList(List<UnilateralSortMerger.ChannelWithBlockCount> channelIDs,
                                                                                  List<org.apache.flink.core.memory.MemorySegment> allReadBuffers,
                                                                                  List<org.apache.flink.core.memory.MemorySegment> writeBuffers)
                                                                           throws IOException
        Merges the given sorted runs to a smaller number of sorted runs.
        参数:
        channelIDs - The IDs of the sorted runs that need to be merged.
        allReadBuffers -
        writeBuffers - The buffers to be used by the writers.
        返回:
        A list of the IDs of the merged channels.
        抛出:
        IOException - Thrown, if the readers or writers encountered an I/O problem.

      • mergeChannels

        protected UnilateralSortMerger.ChannelWithBlockCount mergeChannels(List<UnilateralSortMerger.ChannelWithBlockCount> channelIDs,
                                                                   List<List<org.apache.flink.core.memory.MemorySegment>> readBuffers,
                                                                   List<org.apache.flink.core.memory.MemorySegment> writeBuffers)
                                                            throws IOException
        Merges the sorted runs described by the given Channel IDs into a single sorted run. The merging process uses the given read and write buffers.
        参数:
        channelIDs - The IDs of the runs' channels.
        readBuffers - The buffers for the readers that read the sorted runs.
        writeBuffers - The buffers for the writer that writes the merged channel.
        返回:
        The ID and number of blocks of the channel that describes the merged run.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getSegmentsForReaders

        protected final void getSegmentsForReaders(List<List<org.apache.flink.core.memory.MemorySegment>> target,
                                           List<org.apache.flink.core.memory.MemorySegment> memory,
                                           int numChannels)
        Divides the given collection of memory buffers among numChannels sublists.
        参数:
        target - The list into which the lists with buffers for the channels are put.
        memory - A list containing the memory buffers to be distributed. The buffers are not removed from this list.
        numChannels - The number of channels for which to allocate buffers. Must not be zero.

      • registerChannelToBeRemovedAtShudown

        Adds a channel to the list of channels that are to be removed at shutdown.
        参数:
